strings.Value: {n}A very pale gnome with dull brittle hair is scribbling something busily on a small scroll, not looking up as you approach.{/n} "Ah, here you are. At last! Go read the rules quickly – they're posted a little further along. The other teams already arrived a while ago. The Host said we'll start as soon as you show up and read the rules."
"Of course, I'm famous enough for my admirers to follow my every move. But still, I'd like to know – how did you know we were coming?"
{n}The gnome shrugs.{/n} "The Host said so. Well, are you going to keep wasting time? Read the rules and we'll start."
